name: CRUSH II
description:
Blocks are rapidly falling onto the screen. Touch any two blocks on the screen to crush them, build up your combo, and score points!

Don't let the screen fill up!This ain't your casual matching game. This game will test your reaction speed, awareness, endurance and skill.

Try both modes!

Colorblind mode available.

Score achievements and show your stuff on the leaderboards thanks to Clay.io integration!

Check out the Android Rundown Review

NOTE: OSX version requires 10.7 or higher. Android Version requires Android 4.0 or later.

Android users! If you want, you can grab it on Google Play for automatic updates, but you won't get a desktop version of the game.
